events.name: TemperatureAlertIssued
events.description: Triggered when the temperature exceeds threshold limits during cold chain monitoring.

events.name: HumidityAlertIssued
events.description: Triggered when humidity levels are outside acceptable ranges.

events.name: ColdChainBreachDetected
events.description: Occurs when a breach in the temperature-controlled environment is detected.

events.name: NotificationAcknowledged
events.description: Fired when a user acknowledges a notification.

commands.name: IssueTemperatureAlert
commands.description: Triggered when the temperature exceeds threshold limits during cold chain monitoring.

commands.name: IssueHumidityAlert
commands.description: Triggered when humidity levels are outside acceptable ranges.

commands.name: ReportColdChainBreach
commands.description: Occurs when a breach in the temperature-controlled environment is detected.

commands.name: AcknowledgeNotification
commands.description: Fired when a user acknowledges a notification.

integrationPoints.name: MonitoringSystem
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with external monitoring systems for real-time data on temperature and humidity.

integrationPoints.name: AlertManagementSystem
integrationPoints.description: To send alerts and notifications to users based on detected events.

integrationPoints.name: ReportingSystem
integrationPoints.description: For generating reports related to cold chain monitoring and breaches.
